T02D1271:96b-1: he badzra dvi bhu dza s'a dha nam /
T02D1271:96b-3: kye rdo rje phyag gnyis pa'i sgrub thabs /
T02D1271:96b-4: rje btsun thugs rje chen po la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D1271:96b-6: dpal mgon bla ma la btud de //
T02D1271:96b-7: de sgrub cho ga zhi ba yi //
T02D1271:96b-8: zhal snga nas gsungs rab dbye bya //
T02D1271:96b-9: dpa' bo zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa //
T02D1271:96b-10: bdag med ma yis mgul nas 'khyud //
T02D1271:96b-11: 'khor lo la sogs rgyan dang ldan //
T02D1271:96b-12: spyan gsum zhabs gnyis 'dam skyes mda' //
T02D1271:96b-13: rgyud 'dir bsgom pa la dbang bar bya ba'i rnal 'byor pas /
T02D1271:96b-14: nang par snga bar mal nas langs te /
T02D1271:96b-15: rang gi snying gar nyi ma la gnas pa'i h'um bltas la /
T02D1271:96b-16: de'i 'od zer gyis dpal he ru ka snang bar byas te /
T02D1271:96b-17: me tog la sogs pa'i nye bar spyod pa lngas legs par mchod nas /
T02D1271:96b-18: de'i spyan sngar sdig pa bshags pa dang /
T02D1271:96b-19: bsod nams la rjes su yi rang ba dang /
T02D1271:96b-21: byang chub chen por sems bskyed de //
T02D1271:96b-22: sems can thams cad la lha rdzas kyi bde ba nye bar sbyor ba'i byams pa dang /
T02D1271:96b-23: sdug bsngal thams cad nye bar sel ba'i rnam pa'i snying rje dang /
T02D1271:96b-24: bde ba de dag rgyun mi 'chad par nges pa'i rnam pa'i dga' ba dang /
T02D1271:96b-26: nye ba'i nyon mongs pa dang /
T02D1271:96b-27: gzung ba dang 'dzin pa la sogs pa yid la
T02D1271:96b-28: mi byed pa'i mtshan nyid kyi btang snyoms bsgom mo
T02D1271:96b-29: // de nas chos dang gang zag la sogs pa'i dri mas ma gos pa'i ngo bo /
T02D1271:97a-1: thams cad skye ba med pa'i tshul la zhugs pa'i stong pa nyid rnam par bsgoms la /
T02D1271:97a-2: aom sh'u n+ya t'a dzny'a na badzra sva dh'a wa a'atma ko& ham /
T02D1271:97a-3: zhes bya bas byin gyis brlab po //
T02D1271:97a-4: de nas sad par byas la nam mkha'i phyogs su
T02D1271:97a-5: nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor la gnas pa'i h'um yig ste
T02D1271:97a-6: de yongs su gyur pa las rdo rje'i lte ba
T02D1271:97a-7: la gnas pa'i h'um yig bltas nas /
T02D1271:97a-8: de'i 'od zer las byung ba'i dpal he ru ka'i
T02D1271:97a-9: gzugs kyis 'gro ba ma lus pa'i don byas la
T02D1271:97a-11: de yongs su gyur pa las dpal he ru ka
T02D1271:97a-12: sna tshogs padma'i 'dab ma la gnas pa'i ro'i steng
T02D1271:97a-13: du nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor la bzhugs pa /
T02D1271:97a-14: phyag gnyis pa spyan gsum pa /
T02D1271:97a-16: g-yon na rdo rjes mtshan pa'i thod pa bsnams pa /
T02D1271:97a-17: gar dang bcas pa stag gi pags pa'i sham thabs can /
T02D1271:97a-18: dbu la mi bskyod pa'i bdag nyid mi mgo las byas pa'i 'khor lo /
T02D1271:97a-19: snyan la 'od dpag med kyi bdag nyid rna cha gdub 'khor /
T02D1271:97a-20: mgul du rin 'byung gi bdag nyid mgur chu /
T02D1271:97a-21: phyag la rnam par snang mdzad kyi bdag nyid gdu bu 'chad ba /
T02D1271:97a-22: rked pa la don yod grub pa'i bdag nyid ska rags dang ldan pa /
T02D1271:97a-26: dbu skra dmar ser gyen du phyogs pa /
T02D1271:97a-27: bdag med ma zhal gcig phyag gnyis ma /
T02D1271:97a-28: gri gug dang thod pa 'dzin pas 'khyud pa ste /
T02D1271:97a-29: da lta bur gyur par bdag nyid rnam par bsgoms la /
T02D1271:97a-30: de nas 'di'i rna ba la bdag med ma /
T02D1271:97a-31: mig dag la rdo rje ma /
T02D1271:97a-32: sna la gsang ba'i dkar mo /
T02D1271:97a-34: lus kyi dbang po la rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma /
T02D1271:97a-35: yid la bdag med mar mos par bya'o //
T02D1271:97a-36: de nas mgo bo la padma sum cu rtsa gnyis pa'i steng du ham yig thur du bltas pa'o //
T02D1271:97a-37: mgul par 'dab ma bcu drug pa'i steng du aom yig steng du bltas pa'o //
T02D1271:97a-38: snying gar 'dab ma brgyad pa'i steng du thur du phyogs pa'i h'um yig go //
T02D1271:97a-39: lte bar 'dab ma drug cu rtsa bzhi pa'i steng du phyogs pa'i aam yig bsam mo //
T02D1271:97b-0: de nas dam tshig sems dpa' dang 'dra ba'i ye shes @97b sems dpa' spyan drangs te /
T02D1271:97b-2: zhes bya'i sngags 'dis dgug pa dang /
T02D1271:97b-6: 'o ma dang chu bzhin du ro mnyam par bya'o //
T02D1271:97b-7: de ma thag tu rang gi snying ga'i nyi ma
T02D1271:97b-8: la rdo rje'i lte ba la gnas pa'i h'um yig
T02D1271:97b-9: las byung ba'i 'od zer de rnams kyis /
T02D1271:97b-10: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rang bzhin he ru ka spyan drangs te /
T02D1271:97b-12: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis bdag la dbang bskur du gsol zhes gsol ba gdab po //
T02D1271:97b-13: de nas de rnams kyis bdud rtsi lnga yis gang
T02D1271:97b-14: ba'i nor bu'i bum pa dag gis dbang bskur ba
T02D1271:97b-15: dang / bdag la mi bskyod pa'i cod pan du bsam mo //
T02D1271:97b-16: de nas rnal 'byor ma thams cad kyis tshogs kyi
T02D1271:97b-17: rang rang gi byang chub kyi sems la sogs pa'i
T02D1271:97b-20: mche ba gtsigs pa 'jigs chen po //
T02D1271:97b-21: rgyu ma'i me tog phreng bas brgyan //
T02D1271:97b-22: sha chen po dag gsol mdzad pa //
T02D1271:97b-23: he ru ka dpal bdag phyag 'tshal //
T02D1271:97b-25: de nas nam mkha' la h'um yongs su gyur pa las rdo rje'o //
T02D1271:97b-26: de'i 'og tu yi ge a'a: yongs su gyur pa las padma'i snod de //
T02D1271:97b-27: de'i nang du aom yig gis mtshan pa'i go ku da ha na /
T02D1271:97b-28: ma ra mu shu bi la sogs pa'i dam tshig gi dngos po rnams te /
T02D1271:97b-29: rdo rje dang padma yang dag par sbyor ba las /
T02D1271:97b-31: de'i rdzas rnams gdus pa dang /
T02D1271:97b-32: smin nas khu bar byas te /
T02D1271:97b-33: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gzugs ston pa'i ye shes kyi nyi mar byed de /
T02D1271:97b-34: ye shes kyi sa bon de'i 'od zer rnams kyis
T02D1271:97b-35: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes kyi
T02D1271:97b-37: dngos po rnams dang lhan cig tu byas nas /
T02D1271:97b-39: zhes bya ba'i yi ge gsum gyis byin gyis brlabs te /
T02D1271:97b-40: lce h'um yig dkar po las byung ba'i rdo rje'i
T02D1271:97b-41: rang bzhin du byas la bdag nyid de yis tshim
T02D1271:97b-42: par bya'o // de nas snying ga'i 'od nyi ma
T02D1271:97b-43: la rdo rje'i lte bar gnas pa'i h'um yig la
T02D1271:97b-44: legs par bskor nas gnas pa'i /
T02D1271:97b-45: aom tre lo ky'a kshe pa h'um h'um h'um phat sv'a h'a /
T02D1271:98a-0: zhes bya ba'i yi ge bcu gnyis @98a * //
T02D1271:98a-1: pa'i sngags kyi phreng ba mar me'i phreng ba bzhin du 'bar ba yid kyis mngon par bris la /
T02D1271:98a-2: rim pa brjod pa bzhin du rgyun mi 'chad par bzlas pa bya'o //
T02D1271:98a-3: gung dang phyi dro'i thun mtshams ni yud tsam gyis dpal he ru ka'i gzugs su byas te /
T02D1271:98a-4: de nas mig la sogs pa rnam par dag pa dang /
T02D1271:98a-8: bdud rtsi myang ba la sogs pa bya'o //
T02D1271:98a-10: sgrub pa'i thabs mchog byas pa las //
T02D1271:98a-11: bsod nams gang zhig grub pa des //
T02D1271:98a-12: 'gro kun rdo rje 'dzin gyur cig / kye rdo rje phyag gnyis pa'i sgrub thabs rdzogs so /
T02D1271:98a-14: // / mkhas pa chen po t'a ra shr'i'i zhal snga nas mdzad pa /
T02D1271:98a-15: bal po'i pandita su ma ti k'i rti dang /
